text: The Gifts is a 1970 American short documentary film about water pollution in the United States. The film was produced by Robert McBride for the United States Environmental Protection Agency. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *The Gifts at Richter Productions * Category:1970 films Category:1970s documentary films Category:1970 short films Category:American films Category:American short documentary films Category:American independent films Category:Documentary films about water and the environment Category:English-language films Category:1970 independent films Category:Water pollution in the United States
